style_axes.target: minimal with a touch of warmth (70/30)
light dimensionality via gradients and subtle shadows

color_mood.description:
Cool, pastel-leaning palette with pale blues, lavender, sage, and muted neutrals; gentle gradients
  for depth.

typography_mood.description:
Clean, friendly sans-serif with soft geometry, medium weights, and generous spacing; clear, quiet
  hierarchy.
dos: keep type sizes modest and readable

add breathing room between lines
  and sections
donts: use sharp geometric or ultra-condensed fonts

imagery_rules.photography_or_illustration:
Serene photography or soft, minimal illustration; imagery feels contemplative and
  airy.
dos: use natural light and soft focus
favor subtle silhouettes and gentle shapes
use card-based modules with rounded corners
donts: use dense grids with tight gutters
add heavy borders or hard outlines

references_summary: Minimal photo covers with quiet type
risks_or_watchouts:
Too many gradients can feel dated or
  cliché
Avoid slipping into generic meditation-app tropes
